questions.question_text_1: In a J-K flipflop, when J = 1 and K = 0, it toggles the flipflop’s state.
question_texts: In a J-K flipflop, when J = 1 and K = 0, it toggles the flipflop’s state.

questions.question_text_1: A multiplexer is a digital circuit that selects one of the several input signals and forwards it to a single output line.
question_texts: A multiplexer is a digital circuit that selects one of the several input signals and forwards it to a single output line.

questions.question_text_1: In a positive-edge-triggered D flipflop, if the D input is 1 and the clock signal transitions from low to high, Q output is 1.
question_texts: In a positive-edge-triggered D flipflop, if the D input is 1 and the clock signal transitions from low to high, Q output is 1.

questions.question_text_1: Sequential circuits do not utilize feedback loops, while combinational circuits do.
question_texts: Sequential circuits do not utilize feedback loops, while combinational circuits do.

questions.question_text_1: If we want to design the given minterm using 3-input NAND gates, what is the minimum number of NAND gates required?
question_texts: If we want to design the given minterm using 3-input NAND gates, what is the minimum number of NAND gates required?

questions.question_text_1: If we want to design the given minterm using 2:1 multiplexers, what is the minimum number of multiplexers required?
question_texts: If we want to design the given minterm using 2:1 multiplexers, what is the minimum number of multiplexers required?
